bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The expanded summary of the House reported version is repeated here.)
Risk-Based Credit Examination Act
(Sec. 2) This bill amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to provide the Securities and Exchange Commission's Office of Credit Ratings with discretion concerning reviewable matters during its annual examination of nationally recognized statistical rating organizations.
